1.title: Which show?

11.content: Who is going to dominate?
11.title: The Walking Dead

1153332.content:
Lydia sat alone in one of the gardens of Hilltop. She preferred to be alone anyways. Nobody in the community liked nor trusted her. The only exceptions were Henry and Daryl. Lydia felt like she was trapped between two groups, the both of them didn't trust her, the both of them she had belong to at some point. She wanted to go home, but what was home now, she thought? The only think that linked her to the Whisperers was her mom, but she didn't like that life, nor what they did. Since she joined Hilltop, she had begun to realize this was the life she wanted. But nobody seemed to be willing to accept her. She was picking up a few worms from the dirt on the ground as she watched Enid walk closer. "No, I don't know where Henry is." Lydia told her, anticipating her question.

Enid walks closer. “That’s not what I was going to say. I was going to ask why you were still here? You don’t belong to us. You could be a danger.” She rudely tells Lydia. With a disgusted look on her face.
1153332.title: Lydia

choices: Lydia pulls Enid to the ground
11533321.content:
"What do you want me to do?" Lydia asks her, annoyed. "I'm not like my mom. I don't wanna be with her. I'm nothing like them!"

“Yea? Well we can’t really tell if you’re telling the truth or not can we? What if she just sent you here so you can gather information on us?” Enid says her voice getting louder as she takes another step towards Lydia.

"Leave me alone... I'm not a spy. You know I never leave this place. I'm not allowed anyways. Even if I was, there's no way I can communicate with my mother." Lydia told her, ignoring her as she kept playing with the worms.

“Here I know a place where you can sneak out so you can get back to your freak show” Enid reaches to grab Lydia’s shoulder.

"Don't touch me!" Lydia spoke as she smacked Enid's hand away. "I won't ask you a second time. Stop harassing me or you'll regret it. I'm not like my mom but I do know how to be mean, too." Lydia warned her.

“I’m not scared of you yknow. I’m just looking out for everyone and as far as I know you could be a threat to everyone’s safety!” Enid reaches her hand out again to grab Lydia’s shoulder.
11533321.title: Lydia talks back

choices: Lydia wants Enid to kiss her boots
115333211.content:
Lydia frowned then suddenly yanked Enid from her arm making her fall face-first onto the dirt with worms. Lydia then places her boot on the back of her head keeping her there. "You should fear me."

Enid attempts to pull her head up from the dirt but Lydia’s boot keeps it pinned down. “What the hell! Let me up you bitch!” Enid yells obviously angry.

"Shhh." Lydia shushed her bringing a finger to her lips in the usual whisperer way. "You're too loud. And annoying. I'm gonna have to teach you where YOU belong." She spoke as she squeezed her head with her boot, pressing with her heel a bit.

Enid screams out in pain hoping someone will hear her but no one comes. “Where I belong? I’ll show you where YOU belong as soon as I get up!”

"You won't get up until I want you to get up." Lydia told her calmly. "How does the dirt taste? You like the worms too?" Lydia now laughed at her as she took a seat on Enid's back, her boots resting on each side of Enid's face.

“No I don’t like worms! Because I’m not some FREAK!” She feels Lydia take a seat on her back as she feels the boots on the sides of her face. “Get off me bitch!” She jerks trying to through Lydia off.

"Calm down already. You're not making this any better for you. The sooner you relax, the sooner it'll be over." Lydia spoke as she presses the bottom of her boots on her cheeks. Her unwashed feet smelled even through her thick boots from literal years of being unwashed.

Enid got a whiff of Lydia’s boots and gagged. “Jesus! Have you ever washed those things?” Enid yells at her. “I can literally smell them!”

"I don't remember the last time I bathed. Probably I was still a child when it happened." Lydia laughed out loud. "Whisperer lifestyle. It's not exactly hygienic." She spoke as she tossed Enid to the side, making her lay on her back now so she was facing her. Lydia took another seat on her, this time on Enid's stomach.

Enid flips onto her back. She cringed when she mentioned her lifestyle. “Thats why you’re a freak and belong out there! Now get off!” Enid reaches up to try and grab Lydia.

Lydia grabbed her hands and pinned them down on the ground, then using her feet to step on her wrists, keeping her hands pinned. "You should be more careful with what you say to me. I spent many years with the Whisperers and I could hurt you real bad if I wanted. Luckily for you, I'm not like them, but that doesn't mean I won't own your sorry ass if I have to." Lydia told her.

Enid spits towards Lydia. “I don’t care how you lived! I’ll kick your ass!” Enid says angrily.

Lydia gasps as she wasn't expecting this and Enid's spit hits her in the face. "Ugh..." She says wiping it. "You shouldn't have done that."

“Oh yea? What’re you going to do about it!” She tries to pull her hands out from under Lydia’s boots.

"Don't test me, cunt." Lydia warned her as she kept stepping on her hands.

Enid feels the pressure in her hands. It hurts but she has to stay strong. Enid tried to headbutt Lydia but missed.

Lydia spits back at Enid hitting her in the face as revenge then laughs at her. "You earned that."

“Get off me!” She yells again struggling under Lydia. She completely underestimated this girls strength. Enid attempts to throw Lydia off again.

"Stop struggling." Lydia told her, slapping her on the face with her hand. "Simmer down."

Enid was shocked by the slap. “Did you just- you bitch!” Enid eventually uses most of her strength and just lays back in the dirt.

"That's better." Lydia smiles as she moves a hand across Enid's face, caressing it.

“What the hell are you doing?” Enid asks Lydia.

"Do you question everything all the time?" Lydia asked her as she moved to hold her hands with her own, then moving her boots towards her face.

“What am I not allowed to ask questions now?” Enid saw the boots move towards her face. “Ugh get those things away from me!” Enid said with a disgusted look on her face.
115333211.title: Lydia pulls Enid to the ground

1153332111.content:
"Nope. I don't think I will. In fact, you're gonna kiss my boots and say you're sorry for treating me like this." Lydia spoke with a smile on her face, pressing the tip of her boots on her cheeks.

Enid felt the boot press into her cheek as she gagged on the smell again. “Absolutely not! I’ll do no such thing!”

"You will." Lydia spoke as she pressed them more. "I won't let you go until you do."

Enid tried to pull her head away from Lydia’s boots. “Oh god get them away the smell is horrid!” Enid says while gagging again.

Lydia giggled playfully as she watched Enid's reaction. "No, I'm having way too much fun with this. Give them a kiss!"

“Will you get off me if I do it?” Enid asks clearly fed up.

"Maybe..." Lydia spoke, biting on her bottom lip.

“Fine” Enid says angrily as she puckers her lips and gives the boot on her cheek a small kiss.

"Awww. That's adorable." Lydia wiggled. "But you still didn't apologize to me..."

“Isn’t kissing your horrible boot enough!” Enid yells.
1153332111.title: Lydia wants Enid to kiss her boots

choices: Lydia forces Enid to beg to her
11533321111.content:
"Nope. That was just an extra for my amusement." She told her with a smile.

“Fine” Enid says as she rolls her eyes. “I’m sorry..... that you’re a freak staying where you don’t belong!” Enid says as she tries to get her hands free again.

"What a pity. I thought you'd learn." Lydia sighed. "I'm afraid I'm gonna have to break you more." Lydia spoke angrily.

“What do you mean by that!” Enid asks while still struggling under Lydia’s body.

"You'll find out soon enough." Lydia giggled as she rubbed her boots all over Enid's face.

Enid feels the rough dirty bottom of Lydia’s boots on her face as some dirt comes off and falls onto her mouth. “Stop! This is humiliating!” Enid yells as she spits dirt out of her mouth.

"I know! That's the best part. To humiliate you! You deserve to be humiliated." Lydia spoke as she kept rubbing her boots up and down her face.

Enid was forced to sit there as Lydia rubbed her dirty boots on her face. It actually started to hurt after a while and the smell was just torturing her nose.

"Beg me for mercy." Lydia demanded, wanting to humiliate her further.

“I’ll never beg to you bitch!” Enid yells clearly in a lot of discomfort.
11533321111.title: Nope.

choices: Lydia takes Enid to a secluded location
115333211111.content:
"Hmm. You will. Let's step up our game, shall we?" Lydia spoke as she slid one boot off and tossed it aside, wiggling the toes of her socked foot near her face, the stench was almost unbearable. Her socks were worn and a bit shredded.

Enid gagged at the sight and smell. “What the hell! This has gone too far! Let me up, Lydia!” Enid looked at the socks and couldn’t even tell what color they were originally. “I think I’m gonna pass out.”

"Beg me, bitch!" Lydia demanded, suddenly placing her socked foot right on her face, pressing against it.

Enid continued gagging at the smell and Lydia planting her foot right on her face didn’t help. “I’ll never beg!” Enid turns her face away from Lydia’s foot to gag again.

"Smell it! Deep sniffs, Enid! Take in the smell of my stinky feet!" She taunted her as she rubbed her foot up and down her face, spreading the dirt and the sweat.

Enid got about 4 sniffs in before she passed out from the smell of Lydia’s socked foot.

Lydia rolled her eyes at this and put her foot away. "Wimp." She spoke as she waited for her to wake up.
115333211111.title: Onto more torture

1153332111111.content:
About an hour later Enid woke up but she wasn’t in the dirt anymore.

Lydia had Enid tied up in a chair in the middle of a shack. "Morning." She spoke with a grin.

Enid wakes up and tries to move her arms and legs. She looks around but doesn’t recognize her surroundings. “Where the hell are we?!” Enid asks panicked.

"In a little shack in the middle of nowhere. Nobody will hear you scream here." Lydia explained to her as she stares at her.

“You mean no one will hear you scream. I just gotta get out of these binds” Enid yells while tugging on her binds. On the inside Enid is very scared.

Lydia just laughs at Enid's threat. "You're so cute trying to intimidate me." She smiles as she takes a seat and just looks at Enid trying to get away.

Enid runs out of breath. “Listen, this has gone way too far. Just let me go and we can forget all this happened.” Enid says trying to catch her breath.

"You'd just keep harassing me any chance you got. I gotta make sure you don't do that again." Lydia spoke softly.

“No I would not!” Enid says obviously lying.

"Yeah you would." Lydia says as she moves closer to her. "What are you gonna do about it?"

“Once I get out of these binds you’ll see” Enid says while still tugging on her binds.

"Don't worry, I already made sure you wouldn't. It's very tight." Lydia explained to her as she looked at Enid.

After more struggling Enid eventually gives up. “What’re you gonna do? Look at me to death?”

"Maybe! I love seeing your frustration." She teased her on purpose now.

Enid tried to kick towards her but realized her legs were also tied to the chair. “You really took no chances huh.”

"Of course. I'm no dummy." She told her as she placed a chair right in front of her.

Enid gives up with struggling and just looks down. Her hair blocking Lydia’s view of her face.

Lydia brought up her boots again placing them on top of each of her knees. "Now lemme think what to do next..."

The smell already started going up to Enid’s nose as she throws her head back. “Please get those monsters away from me.”

"Monsters you say?" Lydia looked a bit upset.

"Beauties." She spoke with a smile. "My feet are cute. What about yours?"

“I don’t know I usually don’t give names to feet cus I’m not a freak.” Enid replies with a smirk. “If I can guarantee one thing it’s that my feet definitely smell better because I actually shower!”

"Pffft. Yeah right. That's what you say now. Go on, take those boots off." Lydia dared her.

“If my feet smelled worse you would be able to smell them from inside. Unlike yours which can very clearly be smelled from my position.”

"All I hear is blablabla." Lydia taunted her. "I don't believe you."
1153332111111.title: Lydia takes Enid to a secluded location

choices: Lydia wants Enid to smell her own feet more
11533321111111.content:
Enid used her other foot to slip off her right boot revealing a pale sweaty bare foot. "Happy now?"

Lydia picked up Enid's boot and stared at it, before forcing it onto Enid's face. "Sniff."

“What the fu-“ Enid’s words are cut off as her own boot was forced over her nose. The smell was horrible because she had been wearing them all day and sweating in them with no socks on. Although Enid still didn’t think it was as bad as Lydia’s boots and feet.
11533321111111.title: Enid takes her boots off

115333211111111.content:
After a while, Lydia grinned and put her boot away. "I want a taste~" She spoke with a bit of teasing tone as she got on her knees and pushed her face under Enid's barefoot, nuzzling it as she sniffs it.

“What the hell are you doing!” Enid yelled one shock. “You freak get away!” Enid says while attempting to get her foot away from Lydia’s face.

"Nope~ This little freak is gonna have fun at your expense." Lydia spoke as she stuck out her tongue and began to lick Enid's sweaty foot.

Enid attempts to push Lydia’s face away with her foot. “Stop! They’re sweaty!”

Lydia let out soft moans as Enid's attempts to push her away only made her press her foot harder on her face. "Keep going..."

“Please get away from them! This is so embarrassing!” Enid said clearly surprised by Lydia’s behavior.

"Embarrassing? Why do you say that?" Lydia spoke as she was now licking between her toes.

Enid hadn’t washed her feet in about 2 days so they were bound to be gross. “They’re dirty! I haven’t had the chance to wash them in a couple days!”

"Even better." Lydia grinned as she liked them better that way. "Smelly and sweaty. Just the way I like them." She taunted her, moving her tongue between her toes.

Enid’s look of disgust just grew. “I’m going to tell everyone back at hilltop what you’re doing! You’ll be ruined!”

"What would your words be, exactly? Lydia kidnapped me just to lick my feet?" Lydia giggled softly and smiled at her.

“Y-yea!” Enid said trying to sound confident but even she thought that sounded ridiculous.

"Hmm. I wonder if that would really ruin me, or you." Lydia spoke, kissing the soles of Enid's feet and pressing her face into them.

Enid thought about it for a minute. She’s right that would make Enid seem weak. She just got beaten and kidnapped by a girl who was probably 7 years younger than her.

"Did you rethink that?" Lydia asked her as she looked up at Enid. "Do you still wanna tell on me?"

Enid was speechless. She started to open her mouth to talk but decided not to. She didn’t know how to get out of this situation.

"Yeah, that's what I thought." Lydia spoke as she backed off a bit. "Yours are quite smelly as well. They aren't exactly roses." She says with a teasing tone.

“Didn’t say they were” Enid mumbled in an annoyed voice.
115333211111111.title: Lydia wants to smell

choices: Lydia wants Enid to lick her feet
Lydia wants Enid to keep sniffing her feet
1153332111111111.content:
"Hmm. Oh well." Lydia sat down and started unlacing her boots, coming off rather quickly. She also peeled off her socks to reveal a pair of gorgeous, yet sweaty and absolutely stinky bare feet.

“Oh my god!” Enid said as the smell instantly exploded inside the room. It only got worse as Lydia peeled her socks off. “Your feet look disgusting that’s so much sweat and dirt! And that smell! You need a shower freak!”

"I can actually agree with that. And you're gonna give me one." She spoke as she grinned and quickly raised her dirty feet, wiggling her toes as they approached Enid's face covering her whole sight.

“W-what do you mean by that?” Enid asked with fear in her voice as she watched the feet inch closer and closer to her face. The intense smell increasing every second.

"I think you can already tell." She spoke as the feet finally made contact with Enid's face, resting on top of her face and smothering her under them, covering her face whole.

Enid couldn’t get words out before the unbearably smelly and sweaty feet touched down on her face attacking her sense of smell. Her nose was trapped under Lydia’s arches which gave Enid a small bubble of pure foot stink to smell. She couldn’t breath through her mouth because Lydia’s heels were covering them. Not knowing what to do Enid just screamed into Lydia’s feet with tears forming in her eyes

"Mmm." Lydia moaned a bit at the feeling of her feet touching Enid's face and rubbed them up and down a bit. "Say, are they as bad as you say they are?" She asked as she relaxed her feet there.

“They’re even worse than I remember. This is too much!” Enid yelled with fear still in her voice.
1153332111111111.title: Lydia starts her foot torture

11533321111111111.content:
"Come on, give them a nice lick~" Lydia giggles as she poked Enid's lips with her heel.

Enid turned her head to the side with tears in her eyes. “Please Lydia, anything but that!”

"Come oooon, little worm just stick out your tongue." She taunted her as her foot rubbed up and down her face, a grin on Lydia's face as she did this.

Enid was hell bent on not putting her tongue to those feet as she clamped her mouth shut and just smelled the feet as they ran up and down her face.

"At least let me hear those sniffs, cutie." Lydia taunted her, placing the bottom of her toes right on Enid's nose for her to smell.

The toes were not something that Enid was prepared for. She takes a sniff of Lydia’s toes and her head recoils back looking straight up and gags. “Jesus! It’s so bad. Lydia please! Let me go!”

"Shhh..." She stroked Enid's face with her other foot as she forces her toes on her nose more, pressing against it. "Smell..."

Enid unable to do anything else takes another sniff as she gags and has tears start falling down her face. Or is that just Lydia’s foot sweat it was hard to tell.

Lydia smiles as she sees Enid trying to endure her stinky feet. She loved how it felt. "Come on, keep sniffing, tell me how much you like them."

Enid manages to get her face free from Lydia’s feet. “Lydia, this is disgusting. Let me go! We never have to speak of this again! I won’t bother you anymore!”

"Aww you're no fun!" Lydia positions her feet on top of Enid's shoulders, wiggling them just inches away from her face. "Come here..." She puts one foot on her face and places the other one behind her head, pressing her face against the other foot.

Enid felt the foot behind her head push her face into Lydia’s other foot. Enid takes another breath and since her nose was in between Lydia’s toes she felt whatever gunk was in between her toes as she gags and cries some more. Enid looks at Lydia with pleading eyes.

"Shhh." Lydia tells her, making a sexy face as her cheeks turned red. She forced her big toe into Enid's mouth and wiggled it on her tongue.

Enid’s face squeezed up as she felt the toe enter her mouth almost instantly all of her tastebuds were attacked by Lydia’s foot sweat and whatever other gunk was on her toe.

"You like the taste? I bet you do." Lydia teased her some more as she put her toes in her mouth. She couldn't even imagine how strong they had to taste after so many years of walking and not washing them.

Enid has never tasted anything as disgusting as Lydia’s foot. She was constantly gagging. Enid started jerking around to attempt to get the feet out of her face. When that failed she just screamed and cried as the toes continued to wiggle in her mouth.

Lydia smiled as she watched this as she only kept rubbing her feet up and down her face. "I told you you'd regret crossing me."

Enid couldn’t respond in words. There was too much happening as she continued to cry and gag on Lydia’s dirty toes.

"Stick out your tongue." Lydia commanded now as she pressed her toes on Enid's cheeks.

“F-fuck you.” Enid said weakly.

Lydia placed one foot between Enid's legs and started pressing. "Stick. Out. Your tongue."
11533321111111111.title: Lydia wants Enid to lick her feet

115333211111111111.content:
Enid couldn’t go through much more so she did as she was told and stuck out her tongue. “Please don’t do it Lydia!” She cried.

"Shhh. Shush Enid." Lydia told her as she dragged her foot across Enid's tongue, all the way from heel to toes.

Enid started crying again as she felt Lydia’s foot drag across her tongue. She couldn’t even describe the taste. She attempted to spit out the foot gunk she collected on her tongue. “Lydia no more! I’m sorry!”

"You're sorry? So now you're sorry, huh? You're only sorry because you're having to taste and smell my pretty feet, not because you're genuinely sorry." Lydia told her, moving her foot back to her face.

“No! No more please!” Enid yelled out as she saw Lydia’s dirty foot moving towards her face again. Weird thing was that even after Enid was forced to suck her toes. Her toes barely looked any cleaner.

"Lick them, Enid. Let me see that tongue move." Lydia spoke as she pressed her toes on her lips again, smiling wide.

“No please! Please no mor-“ she was interrupted by Lydia’s toes going in her mouth again as Enid unwillingly licked them

Lydia giggled at Enid's frustration as she wiggled her toes. She moved closer to Enid as she then freed her feet.

“T-thank you!” Enid cried. “I promise I’ll never bother you again just free my hands now too.”
115333211111111111.title: Enid gives in

choices: Enid lets Lydia have her feet
1153332111111111111.content:
"I'll free your hands later. Now I want your feet on my face." Lydia told her.

“Lydia please!” Enid cried desperately

"Please, just listen to me." Lydia whispers. "Be obedient and I'll let you go. Or do you wanna lick my feet more?"
1153332111111111111.title: Lydia wants something

11533321111111111111.content:
Enid decided it would be better to be obedient as she took off her left boot with the help of her right and held her feet up to Lydia.

"That's better." Lydia giggles as a blush showed up on her face. "It shows you've never done feet stuff before."

“Why would I? Feet are disgusting as you’ve proved today!” Enid yelled sounding ruder than she meant to be.

"You'll end up loving them. Or mine, at least." Lydia told her confidently. "Lemme smell yours again. I already crave them." She says trying to sound as creepy as possible.

Enid now completely scared of Lydia gives her her feet again. “H-how long are you gonna keep me here? They’ll realize I’m missing and come look for me!”

"Don't be stupid. You'll tell them yourself whenever that you were out on a run with me and that'll be the end of it." Lydia explained to her as she pressed her face against Enid's feet again.

Enid didn’t want Lydia’s feet back in her mouth so she decided not to respond and just sniff. The smell had not gotten more bearable in the slightest. In fact Enid thinks they’re somehow more smelly than when Lydia initially took off her boots.

Lydia took her chance to taunt Enid by rubbing her feet on her face some more, just enough so she'd always keep smelling them.

Enid gags on the smell as she feels some of the years old dirt come off on her face.

"I love it when you sniff my feet, you know? I could get used to that." Lydia teased her some more with an almost evil grin. She may've found her new hobby after all.

“Well don’t. After you let me go I’ll never be doing it again.”

"What if someone wanted to smell your feet? Would you let them?" Lydia asked now out of genuine curiosity.

“Well I’m obviously letting you do it now!” Enid said angrily.

"It's not like I'm giving you a choice... I mean if you were not tied." Lydia clarifies, pinching her ears with her toes.

Enid shakes her head “watch it! And no probably not!”

"Pffft. Prude." Lydia scoffed as she stated licking Enid's feet once again, licking all the sweat.

Enid couldn’t hold it anymore as she started laughing from the tickling happening by Lydia’s tongue. “Stop it!” Enid finally cracked and was begging through laughs.

"Ohhh you're ticklish!" Lydia went wild and now used her fingers to tickle Enid's feet, as well as her tongue between her toes.

Enid couldn’t stop laughing so she started to turn blue in the face from lack of air. “Please! No more!” Enid said between gasps.

Lydia stopped a but just to kiss the soles of her feet gently while moaning.

“Lydia just please let me go.” Enid begged

"Maybe later I will. I think you and I could even become very close at this rate. Maybe we could even date." She says with a smile.

Enid’s cheeks turned red. “I have a boyfriend and so do you, I think. Plus why would we so you can lick my feet? Or so you can make me smell your nasty ones whenever you want.” Enid sounded flustered

"Yeah, both are correct." Lydia said as she nodded. It sounded extremely lovely to her, and seeing Enid flustered made Lydia question if Enid was really disliking this. "You can admit it if there's something about this that turns you on."

“You’re tongue feels warm against my soles. But I’m still not completely comfortable with it.” Enid said. She didn’t want to tell her that her dirty feet were a turnoff because she wanted to keep her odds of escaping high.

"Well, you'll get used to it." Lydia whispered as she kept licking her feet, moaning a bit as she did.

Enid just sat back and enjoyed not having feet in her face although the stench of Lydia’s feet still dominated the room.

Lydia was still having her fun with Enid's feet, licking them and nuzzling them. "You're seriously telling me you wouldn't like someone to do this to you?" She teased.

Enid blushes. “I mean it feels good. I guess..” Enid looks down.

"You guess?" Lydia spoke moving her tongue across her soles.

Enid shivers. “Ok ok it feels good. But the stench in this room is so bad!”

"What are you talking about? Smelly is better. Smelly feet is arousing." Lydia giggled.

“Maybe for you! I would let you lick my feet in my trailer if your feet didn’t stink it up. I don’t think I can get used to it.” Enid said sounding ruder than she meant too. Probably offending Lydia.

"You'll get used to it. You won't leave this shack until you beg me to keep smelling them." Lydia spoke calmly. "Wow, you'd let me lick your feet? That's an improvement over you calling me a freak and wanting to kick me out."

“W-what do you mean? Please Lydia don’t make me smell them anymore” Enid cried out.

"Why not? I don't have anyone else to smell my feet. You're the perfect candidate." She said happily.

“Lydia I already said you could lick my feet. Isn’t that enough?” Enid said tears forming in her eyes from the thought of having to smell Lydia’s feet again

"Not until you enjoy it. It's boring and dull when it's one-sided. I have to train you first." Lydia spoke as she rested her feet on Enid's lap.

“Lydia please! I already said I enjoyed you licking them so it’s not one sided” Enid said trying to change Lydia’s mind.

"I'm not talking about receiving... I mean giving." Lydia says softly.

“W-what if I never come to enjoy them? Then what?” Enid asked concerned

Lydia shrugged softly. "You'd probably be my footslave for a long time, then."

“Y-you can’t do that. We have to go back to hilltop at some point!” Enid said scared.

"Really? Do you think anyone would miss me there?" Lydia asked as she furrowed a brow.

“H-Henry will! And they’ll all wonder where I went and you’d be prime suspect!” Enid said calmly

"So now you care about Henry, huh? You weren't so concerned when you were trying hard to kick me out and away from him." Lydia said, looking a tad angry.

“W-well you’ve made it perfectly clear you don’t plan on leaving.” Enid’s fear grew.

"Don't bullshit a bullshiter, Enid. You knew Henry used to have a crush on you and you friendzoned him. Now he's dating me and you want me away. What for? Do you want Henry to simp for you or something?" Lydia spoke with her arms crossed.

“No! I already have a boyfriend!” Enid yelled. She was going to stop there but something else slipped out. “I just don’t want to wonder around with you and be forced to sniff your feet whenever you want!” Enid yelled angrily.

"Well too bad. You're a whore and a cockteaser and I'm gonna make you pay for all you did to Henry." Lydia spoke, bringing her feet to her face again.

“No please Lydia!” Enid screamed as Lydia lifted her feet to her face.

"Shut up and take it like a woman, bitch." Lydia told her as she began to rub her nose with her toes.

“MMPH” was all Enid could manage to get out before her face was covered by Lydia’s feet. She took her first breath and gagged underneath them. Somehow after all this time they were just as smelly as when she took them off. Tears started streaming down her face.

"Come on, deep sniffs, Enid. Let me hear you sniff deep." Lydia spoke as she smiled wide, wiggling her toes.

Alicia couldn't hold back much longer and moved her face closer, smelling Charlie's feet at the same time she did.

Charlie continued to sniff her own feet for a couple of minutes before stopping hoping Alicia wouldn’t notice. Charlie began taking in breaths of fresh air. Well. As fresh as air could get in a room that smells like feet.

Alicia was now almost completely focused on enjoying Charlie's feet herself, allowing Charlie a few moments of relief. Alicia pressed her face against Charlie's foot, taking deep sniffs and letting out soft moans as she exhaled. It was almost fascinating to see if it weren't because Charlie was terrified.

Charlie didn’t know how to react so she just didn’t react. She let Alicia sniff her feet even if she didn’t want her to. She didn’t want to be punished because she took them away.

"Mmm." A pink blush showed up in Alicia's face, slightly noticeable if Charlie took a glance. Alicia then laid down on the bed by Charlie's side. "Charlie? I want you to press your feet on my face. Just like I did to you yesterday. Be glad... Whenever I'm not doing the worshipping, you'll be the one doing it, so take these moments as little breaks."

Charlie took her feet and pressed them into Alicia’s face. She rubbed her soles up and down her face. Hoping what she was doing would satisfy her.

"Oh yeah, just like that, spread that delicious stench..." Alicia told her almost in a creepy manner, which could surely make Charlie even more creeped out.

Creeped out Charlie was. She didn’t know how to react so she just kept on rubbing her feet on Alicia’s face. Every so often she would rub her foot in Alicia’s hair.

"Good girl, good girl. See? You're learning fast. When you're older, you could even have your own little footslave if you manage to find one." Alicia taunted her, now sticking out her tongue.

Charlie continued rubbing her feet over Alicia’s face and now her tongue. She had to admit it felt good but she wasn’t so sure she could do this to another person unwillingly.

Alicia skillfully dragged her tongue all over Charlie's foot in a way Charlie herself could feel satisfying, even. She took deep sniffs as she did it, letting out a few more soft moans.

Charlie continued rubbing her feet putting extra focus on rubbing her feet on Alicia’s tongue as it felt warm. Her feet were still cold so she found a way to warm them up.

"I bet that, at the slightest, you dislike this less than you being the one to do the worshipping, am I wrong?" Alicia asked her, now giving Charlie's feet a gentle kiss as they touched her face.

“Y-yes! I don’t have to have smelly feet in my face so it’s so much better.” She tells Alicia.

"Mhmm. I figured as much. I love this too so it's a win-win for me. Go on... Keep rubbing. Please your mistress." Alicia told her teasingly. She actually didn't plan on things going like this, but she had found Charlie's feet irresistible once she watched her worship herself.

Hearing the word mistress made Charlie scared Alicia would force her to call Alicia that. She continued rubbing her feet all over her face trying to please Alicia.

Alicia was aware of Charlie's fear. She didn't take pride on scaring a little girl, however, she was willing to use that to her advantage. She occasionally opened her mouth when Charlie's toes came close to give them a playful lick.

Charlie let Alicia have her way with her feet. Whether that be licking sucking or smelling. She just didn’t want to be punished by Alicia.

"I know you're scared, however, I want you to know nothing bad will happen to you as long as you're obedient. Be a good girl for me and I promise I'll be your guardian angel." Alicia spoke, hoping Charlie understood the metaphor.

“Y-yes Alicia” Charlie stammered as she started rubbing her feet on Alicia’s face again. “I-is this good?”

"Oh, it is. You're great at this, honey. I might ask you to do this sometime. You don't mind, do you?" Alicia asked rethorically. She wasn't expecting a different answer.

“S-sure” Charlie said knowing she wouldn’t have a choice either way.

"Mhmm. Good girl. Maybe I can make you like it if I'm the one doing the worshipping. Does it feel good?" She asked her softly.

Charlie has to admit it did feel good to have someone lick her feet. She wouldn’t say she liked having someone worship her feet but it wasn’t unpleasant. “Yes.”

"It's a start. You'll see there's more to this than meets the eye." Alicia spoke, giving Charlie's sole

Charlie didn’t understand what she meant by that and wasn’t sure she ever would. She wiggled her toes in response to the kiss.

"With this, what I mean is, nothing is as gross as it seems or even unpleasant. Just like alcohol is gross to someone at first but then they like it. Just to name an example." Alicia explained to her. She wasn't sure how to explain fetishes to a kid without getting graphic, but she tried.

Charlie starts to understand but still doesn’t fully.

"Can you hand over your sneakers for a sec?" Alicia requested.

Charlie gets up to grab her sneakers then hands them to Alicia. Knowing what Alicia did to her last time with her sneakers a look of fear came over her face.

1212121222212221122212111211222211111211.content:
"Don't worry, it's not for you, but it's a demonstration of what you could do when it's your turn." Alicia spoke before pressing the inside of Charlie's sneaker against her face, taking deep sniffs. She then stuck out her tongue and licked the sole inside a bit.

Charlie just watched Alicia sniff her shoes which she knew were foul. She’s had those shoes since the beginning of everything.

"I can tell these have been worn for a while. How long have you been in them? Hell, how long it's been since you washed those feet?" She asked, genuinely curious.

“I’ve had the shoes since the beginning. They were one of the last things my parents got for me. My feet. I’m not really sure. A couple weeks? Maybe?”

"Genuinely curious. Did you find a river? A shower with running water? A lake? Lakes can actually make them more dirty if the water's not clean enough." Alicia taunted her as she kept on worshiping the sneaker.

“There was a shower on the bus. Though I only got to use it a couple times.”

"Aww. You poor thing. Then I bet the tongue bath I gave your foot actually felt better than I thought." She says smirking wide. "So? Aren't you gonna thank me?"
